parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of button images or names assigned to the given user action. A maximum of maxKeys keys is listed. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key Actions|user action names]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[Structured Text]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''actionKeysImages''' userAction

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''actionKeysImages''' [userAction, maxKeys]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_text = actionKeysImages "ReloadMagazine"</inner><close></pre></close></ext>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_reload = actionKeysImages ["ReloadMagazine",1]</inner><close></pre></close></ext>will return '''"R"''' (incl. the quotation marks!)

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysNames]], [[actionKeysNamesArray]], [[actionName]], [[inputAction]]
</value></part></template>
